找了一個方法來看是否 influxdb port forward 是否掛掉, 然後通知到 slack
nc -z influxdb-IP port |if $? == "1" ; then curl --data "er.influxdb is down" '<https://g0v-tw.slack.com/s> ervices/hooks/slackbot?token=token&channel=%40user'
